thread.title: Sandra Hopkins
thread.title_full: Rush Hair and Beauty reviewed by Sandra Hopkins

author: Sandra Hopkins
title: Sandra Hopkins
text: This was my second visit to Rush in Leicester and wanted to take advantage of the colour offer. The team were great and service was as good as the first time I went. This is a new salon so was wanting to test them again. Great hair cut and colour - stylist was very knowledgable and friendly Thank you
